title: Mixed-Methods-Based Learning Design Strategies for Online Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific theories and research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: A medium-scale science-focused retraining program for corporate employees, operated in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment with a focus on formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply mixed research methods (quantitative+qualitative) for effective learning design in online environments
Learners can explain integrated utilization strategies of learning analytics (LA) and learning design (LD) tools
Learners can diagnose differences between instructional design decisions and pedagogical beliefs through real-case analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
